scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter is from the English novelist and mother of Anthony Trollope, Frances (Milton) Trollope (1780-1863) while in [Florence, Italy?], September 17, 1854, inviting "Monsieur Gould" to dinner on the next day if he is still in Florence.
